sections.heading: laws; violations; rewards; authorized
sections.text: The county boards of the several counties may offer and pay rewards for the detection of those violating sections 54-301 to 54-309.SourceLaws 1879, § 9, p. 70;R.S.1913, § 104;C.S.1922, § 112;C.S.1929, § 54-309;R.S.1943, § 54-310.
